authors.author: PS886 $DROPEE
authors.replyShort: Thanks for raising this — we’ll reconcile the numbers. If you’re seeing “No eligible NFT found”, share your wallet + a screenshot of that screen. I’ll reconcile any mismatch (DM ok).
authors.draft:
@PS886 $DROPEE Thanks for calling this out. You're right to be frustrated.
On claims/rewards: tell me what you see in-app (screenshot is ok). We'll verify your Founder Pass / OYS allocation and fix any mismatch.
If it's an app/device issue, share the error or steps to reproduce and we'll triage it fast.
If you prefer, DM me your details and I'll handle it 1:1.
I saw your message: "@Oysterguard Hey guys something confusing here, most of us holders got eligibl using our UBS1 ton wallet, 

However when"

authors.author: leyiao
authors.sample: 领取护照怎么一直连不上钱包，一直失败？\n这个没上链吧
authors.replyShort: 懂，我来跟进到有明确结果。 发钱包地址+App里Founder Pass/OYS截图，我核对并修正；不方便公开就私信。
authors.draft:
@leyiao 你提到的这些我看到了，确实会让人很失望/着急，对不起。
关于领取/奖励：你把 App 里看到的页面（截图也行）发一下，我来核对 Founder Pass/OYS 是否少发或显示异常，确认后给你处理。
不方便公开的话也可以私信我你的信息，我一对一帮你搞定。
我看到你说："领取护照怎么一直连不上钱包，一直失败？
这个没上链吧"
